item.title: Episode 37: What's Up Doc?
item.description:
Shownotes

Podcasting 2.0 for May 14th 2021 Episode 37: What's Up Doc?

Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org with Alecks from NA-Tube and Martin from Podfriend and we've got video on the agenda!

And In Alabama, Adjusting the API and Encoding the Endpoints - My Friend on the Other End -- Dave Jones!

Crank those value sliders up on any of these value 4 value streaming payment apps:

Podfriend

Breez app

Sphinx Chat App

Podstation Browser extension

Download the mp3

Preservepodcasting.com

Check out the podcasting 2.0 apps and services newpodcastapps.com

Support us with your Time Talent and Treasure

Shownotes

Bitcoin vs Superchat

PodPing

From NA-Tube International - The Honorable Mr. Alecks Gates

From Podfriend Enterprises - Mr. Martin Mouritzen

Keywords

item.description:
Shownotes

Podcasting 2.0 for April 23d 2021 Episode 34: All Hands On Deck

Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org and welcome The Pirates of Podcast Hosting from Captivate.FM

And In Alabama, The man who has a Head for Hydra and a Body for Podping - Dave Jones!

Crank those value sliders up on any of these value4value streaming payment apps:

Podfriend

Breez app

Sphinx Chat App

Podstation Browser extension

Download the mp3

Preservepodcasting.com

Check out the podcasting 2.0 apps and services newpodcastapps.com

Support us with your Time Talent and Treasure

Shownotes

multiple fee splits and 696969 TLV

NPR subscriptions move spotify

'Owning' the listener

Spotify subscription without tax

What junk do you give away for free then?

Only apple or spotify

Why bother with free content if you can do it exclusively?

Hydra Podping

Anchor article

Captivate.FM

Mark Asquith

Kieran McKeefery

item.title: Episode 28: We got the cat by the tail
item.description:
Shownotes

Podcasting 2.0 for March 11th 2021 Episode 28: We got the cat by the tail

Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org and welcome Paul Itoi and Evan Feenstra from Sphinx Chat to the Board meeting to discuss the Value 4 Value Podcast Payment System

And In Alabama, The only man who can chase a runaway SQL Query - My Friend on the other end - Dave Jones!

Crank those value sliders up everyone!

Download the mp3

Preservepodcasting.com

Check out the podcasting 2.0 apps and services newpodcastapps.com

Support us with your Time Talent and Treasure

Shownotes

Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org and welcome the newly Podcasting 2.0 Certified Members!

Apple +Follow from Odeo

Here's my News Slug: Apple disappoints with new Beta. Ignores 12% of podcasts with enhanced features over circling back to 2008 when Odeo coined +Follow before the platform pivoted to become twitter

Podcasting 2.0 Explainer Doc

Mental Fuel of Motivation

Microdosing Mental Fuel

Lightning labs interview Orange Pill Ryan Gentry

13.2% namespace adoption

Free = Abuse

Sphinx Chat - StakWork

Paul Itoi

Even Feenstra

Keywords

Bugs in the overall system

item.title: Episode 9: Here come the pioneers
item.description:
Show Notes

Podcasting 2.0 for October 30th 2020 Episode 9: Here come the pioneers

Download the mp3

Support us with your Time Talent and Treasure

Shownotes

Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org

Big brass balls is what we have and we will swing them!

Where do podcasters and listeners (users) fit into the development cycle

Authoring tools and hosting

Specifically we focused on the following namespace tags:

host / guest

chapters

captions and transcripts

As always thank you to our Value 4 Value supporters for your Time Talent and Treasure!
